Clipboard.hasFormat

Function/Meaning
Whether the specified format exists in the clipboard
Type
Clipboard class method
Syntax
hasFormat(format)
Arguments
format Specifies the format you want to check for existence.
In the current version, only cbfText can be specified. If this is specified, you can check whether text format data exists in the clipboard.
Return Value
True if the specified format exists in the clipboard, false otherwise
Description
You can check whether the specified format exists in the clipboard.
Since the clipboard provided by the OS can hold multiple formats simultaneously, you can use this method to check if a specific format is among them.
